article_summary:
“The Affordable Care Act and the State’s health insurance exchange offer many people subsidies to make health coverage affordable.
Participants may register by calling (212) 788-3450, or by clicking here to register at Coney Island Hospital.
CMS is the federal agency that provides health coverage for 100 million people through Medicare, Medicaid, and the Children’s Health Insurance Program.
“HHC wants to help people make the most of their health coverage options,” said HHC President Dr. Ram Raju.
Health insurance specialists from CMS will conduct a learning session at Coney Island Hospital on October 1 to prepare residents to enroll when Medicare and the Affordable Care Act reopen for enrollment on October 15 and November 15, respectively.
